name: Simpli-Magic 60 Liter / 16 Gallon Rectangular Hands-Free Dual Compartment Recycling Kitchen Step Trash Can with Soft-Close Lid, Brushed Stainless Steel (40L + 20L Capacity)
short_description: HIGH CAPACITY WASTE AND RECYCLING SOLUTION: Color coded liners in Green (38L) and Black (22L) allow for easy sortation of waste and recycling, without sacrificing waste capacity, and fit standard liners using bag cinch.
HANDS-FREE USE: The stainless-steel foot pedal stands up to daily use and removes the need to touch the lid during waste or recycling disposal to keep hands clean.
SLOW CLOSE LID: Quiet, controlled lid closure is designed to reduce unwanted noise and ease down gently.LID LOCK: Extended open lid lock keeps the container open for longer tasks and chores.
BUILT IN FILTER FOR ODOR CONTROL.
EASY TO MAINTAIN: Finish naturally hides fingerprints, smudges and dirt.
product_description: 60 Liter / 16 Gallon Rectangular Hands-Free Dual Compartment Recycling Kitchen Step Trash Can with Soft-Close Lid, Brushed Stainless Steel (40L + 20L Capacity)

name: simplehuman 58 Liter / 15.3 Gallon Rectangular Hands-Free Dual Compartment Recycling Kitchen Step Trash Can with Soft-Close Lid, Brushed Stainless Steel
short_description: Streamlining the task: Our unique liner rim system is a faster, neater way to trash The outer lid lifts up for easy access to the liner — no need to remove the top of the can or fumble with a clumsy bucket. When you're done, it closes over the liner to keep it neatly out of sight.
Always at your fingertips: Our liner pocket stores a 20 pack of custom fit liners and dispenses them one by one from inside the can.
An elegant recycling solution: Our dual compartment cans make sorting trash ad recycling look good and come in a variety of shapes, sizes and colors to fit any space.
Effortless strength: All it takes is a light touch with our spring-loaded steel pedal, which is engineered to last over 150,000 steps – that’s more than 20 steps a day for 20 years.
Silent close lid: Our patented lid shox technology controls the motion of the lid for a slow, silent close.
Perfect fit – extra strong: Our code H custom fit liners fit this can perfectly so there’s no bunching, slipping or messy bag overhang for a neater, cleaner look.
Pod in, odors out: Our all-natural odorsorb pod fits discreetly inside the lid of your simplehuman can to eliminate trash odors for 45 days.

Optional compost caddy: Add our compost caddy to your trash-sorting routine — it conveniently docks on the side of this trash can encouraging you to separate organics from trash, making waste management even more efficient.
product_description: simplehuman's dual compartment stainless steel rectangular step can makes it easy to neatly sort your trash and recyclables in one convenient, space-efficient space. On one side, it features an innovative 'liner pocket' that stores and dispenses liners from inside the can for a faster liner change. The other side has a convenient handled bucket for easy lifting and disposal of all your recyclables. The stainless steel liner rim grips the liner and keeps it hidden. A strong wide steel pedal is designed to last, and the patented lid shox technology ensures a smooth, silent close every time. Code H liner refill packs store perfectly in this can's liner pocket.

name: The Step N' Sort Slim Design, 2 x 21.5L Dual Trash and Recycling Bin
short_description: Two Removable Inner Bins - each hold 21.5 Liters - use to separate and sort your waste
Slow Close, Quiet Lid
Fingerprint / Smudgeproof stainless steel finish
Heavy-Duty Step pedal
Maximize your space with the slim design
product_description: This large capacity Step N' Sort is perfect for the home and office. Use the two removable inner bins to sort trash, recycling, paper, plastics, and more. Each inner bin holds 21.5 Liters and is easy to clean with soap and water. The heavy-duty step pedals release the slow-close lid allowing for easy hands-free disposal. With a finger-print proof finish, slim profile, and non-skid bottom, this trash and recycler truly has it all!

name: SONGMICS Trash Can, 2 x 10.6 Gallon (2 x 40 L) Garbage Can for Kitchen, with 15 Trash Bags, 2 Compartments, Plastic Inner Buckets and Hinged Lids, Airtight, Black ULTB730B80
short_description: [A Boon for Your Kitchen] Your garbage can doesn’t have to look like garbage; with a black color and a simple silhouette, this step trash can will be an eye-catcher in your kitchen

[Hands-Free Operation] It’s hard to open the lid of a rubbish bin with your hands while you’re eating, and that’s why we designed this trash can with a pedal, letting you have your hands free to tuck away your waste
[Strong yet Soft] The rigid stainless steel body of this garbage can withstands long-lasting use; the soft-close lid ensures the environment remains peaceful, with no loud slamming to be heard
[Bucket in Bin] This trash can includes 2 removable buckets for easy cleaning if your trash bag accidentally breaks and spills. The buckets with inner handles help you lift them out
[What You Get] A dual trash can sized at 25.5”L x 15.9”W x 25”H with 2 x 10.6-gallon compartments, 15 trash bags, plastic inner buckets, and a soft closure mechanism for easy waste disposal

short_description: 【16 Gallon Extra Large Capacity】This double compartments trash can makes it easier for you to separate dry and wet trash, also great to have trash and recycle together. Each compartment has an independent lid to make the trash no smell pollution exists and you can pick each side up and carry it separately. Overall Dimensions: 22.8”width x 12.6”depth x 24.6”height; Capacity: Up to 16 Gallon/60 Liter; Net Weight: 20.5 pounds

【Dual Trash Can with 2 Removable Inner Bins】Each of the two sections in the can has a dark, solid, hard plastic liner, each with a strong stainless steel handle to lift them out separately. The inner-cans have handles, which makes taking the garbage out much easier. Lidded trash bin helps to insulate from the smell, practical step design let you can free your hands

【Stainless Steel 410 Body - Build to Last】This rectangular trash can is made of high quality stainless steel 410 casing with shatter-resistant PP plastic liner bucket to ensure its durability. Featured with premium manual foot pedals, this step trash bin can last for years of daily using. Smooth and bright silver surface with black edges, offer a minimalist yet stylish modern appearance which is suitable for most of the home and office decoration styles

【Quiet and Safe Close】Unlike common trash can, this rectangular trash can featured with a damper which made the lid close slowly with no noise. Effectively avoid the accidental hurt and won't disturb others in public. It has a smooth finish that is easy to wipe if there is a spill, and it remains dent, scrstch-free and shine, great for personal or commercial use

【Widely Applicable & Easy to Wipe Clean】The handles on the inserts allowed you to lift the inserts out and to safely transport overly-full garbage bags to the outdoor cans while eliminating the risk of spillage. Appropriate size is easy to be placed inside the cabinet, under counter, between a toilet and vanity, beside your desk or other small/compact spaces. Simply wipe clean the stainless steel casing with a damp cloth and rinsed out the inner bucket with mild soap and water when needed.
